product_name: DIMETBT Eye Cream to Renew + Refresh
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDIME’s TBT Eye Cream delivers deep hydration to smooth, firm, and plump the delicate eye area. Formulated with bakuchiol-a clean retinol alternative-this gentle yet powerful formula reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles, supports the skin barrier, and restores a more youthful appearance.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesDelivers deep, long-lasting hydrationStrengthens skin barrier to lock in moistureAids in increasing skin firmness and elasticityKey IngredientsBakuchiol: A gentle clean retinol alternative that has been shown to have similar effects without sensitivity and irritation. It can help reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven skin tone, plus speed up skin cell regeneration.Algae Extract (Chlorella Vulgaris): Mimics retinol's receptor activity to plump, firm and rejuvenate skin—without harsh side effects.Squalane: Locks in moisture and strengthens skin’s barrier while delivering antioxidant protection and silky softness.Research ResultsClinically proven to immediately increase hydration by 88%.Restores skin barrier health by 82%.**Clinically shown in 8 weeksItem 2641484How To UseApply AM + PM after cleansing and moisturizing. Gently pat into the under-eye area using your ring finger. Tips & Tricks: Dot the product around your eye, following the curve of your orbital bone, to target the inner corner, under-eye, outer corner, and lid. Use with chilled face roller for added depuffing and absorption.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coco-Caprylate, Dimethicone, Potassium Olivoyl Hydrolyzed Oat Protein, Glyceryl Stearate, Niacinamide, Bellis Perennis (Daisy) Flower Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bakuchiol, Poria Cocos Extract, Phragmites Karka Extract**,**Squalane, Hieracium Pilosella Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Menthyl Lactate, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Tocopheryl Linoleate/Oleate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Spilanthes Acmella Flower Extract, Phytosterols, Phospholipids, Linoleic Acid, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate,1,2-Hexanediol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Glycerin, Lecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Glyceryl Oleate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pullulan.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply AM + PM after cleansing and moisturizing. Gently pat into the under-eye area using your ring finger. Tips & Tricks: Dot the product around your eye, following the curve of your orbital bone, to target the inner corner, under-eye, outer corner, and lid. Use with chilled face roller for added depuffing and absorption.
